## Projects

1. **Alzheimer's Disease Classifier from fMRI Data** | [GitHub](https://github.com/surakshavinod/Alzheimer-Disease-Classifier) \
   Leveraged machine learning approaches to classify Alzheimer's Disease patients, Mild Cognitive Impairment patients, and Healthy Controls using 60 fMRI scans from the ADNI database, achieving 78% prediction accuracy.

2. **CityScout ‚Äì Identifying Safe Cities Based on Crime Statistics** | [GitHub](https://github.com/surakshavinod/CityScout) \
   Built a web-based tool to identify safe U.S. cities using customizable filters by analyzing 2 TB of FBI crime data via PySpark on Google Cloud Platform with Tableau visualization.

3. **Comparison of ML Models to Predict Absorption Properties** | [GitHub](https://github.com/surakshavinod/Model-Comparison-for-Absorption-Profile-Prediction) \
   Applied and compared four ML models to predict PPBR, bioavailability, and PAMPA for drug discovery applications, achieving 71% model accuracy using PyTDC data.
